title.rendered: How to Prepare For a Virtual Career Fair

content.rendered:
In a school year unlike any other, Handshake’s new virtual career fairs are your ticket to getting hired remotely. With a bit of advanced preparation for your first virtual fair, you’ll be ready to wow recruiters from behind your screen! In the video below, team Handshake shares tips for preparing in the days leading up to your virtual career fair, including:

  1. Sign up for sessions early
  2. Research the employers you will meet
  3. Prep your elevator pitch

Watch the full video below to learn how each step can help you make the best impression.

excerpt.rendered: Our team shares tips for getting ready before your virtual career fair.
